title: Services Business Development Manager - USA-AZ-Tempe
text:
Profile BASIC FUNCTION OF JOB Provide presales solution expertise and guidance for RNOC Managed Services to our clients and internal sales teams. Present as a thought leader to our clients and partners. Assess complex services solutions to meet our client’s technology and business needs. Contribute to the development of services solution sales collateral with Product Marketing teams. Assist in transitioning from presales to post sales execution with the internal delivery teams.WORK PERFORMED *Presales Support – Provide advanced presales solution support for Services opportunities *Provides internal and client-facing business and delivery expertise and guidance; participates in   solution design reviews; validates solution approach and associated work products to ensure adherence to company and delivery guidelines. Conducts cost analysis and due diligence studies to determine feasibility of various approaches. *Assists client in defining strategic direction for services solutions. Provides input in mapping business requirements to services solutions. *Evaluates strengths and weaknesses of solution design, suitability; recommends solutions to ensure consistency with the company vision. *Develop proposed solutions – Statements of Work, RFP/RFI responses, and cost modeling (perhaps in conjunction with other internal resources on complex bids), and delegating responsibilities or work efforts within the SSO team to ensure the opportunity is completed in a required time frame. *Provides advice regarding solution questions, prerequisites, solution features, etc. *Assists sales and delivery teams with guidance and pre-sales project management support for complex services solutions.*Sales Solution Collateral Development *Work in conjunction with Product Marketing and Services delivery teams to develop go-to-market strategies, collateral development, and execution models in an effort to drive sales effectiveness and knowledge throughout the organization.*Training *Training sales and sales support teams on Insight defined solution domains *Regularly training and coaching Sales Specialists on new or updated solutions and collateral *Maintaining and developing own individual expertise across the portfolio of Insight Service Solutions Essential Functions of the Job: *Must be able to travel 50%. *Demonstrate ability to drive services sales pipeline *Excellent customer service and verbal communication skills *Excellent written skills and the ability to do some administrative work related to documentation and tracking of opportunities/meeting follow up *Ability to understand and translate the client’s business objectives and requirements *Ability to understand and support the internal sales and delivery objectives and requirements *Regularly exercises discretion and independent judgment *Maintain professional relationships with teammates, partners and clients *Self-motivator and ability to function in role without day to day supervision. MINIMUM REQUIREMENTSEDUCATION AND/OR EXPERIENCE *Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Information Technology or a related field preferred *7+ years’ experience services sales or delivery operations *5+ years’ experience in services solution presales, consulting or professional services *2-4+ years’ experience in IT Services Delivery (NOC or server/networking experience preferred) *IT and/or Project Management Certifications or experience preferred (ex: CCNA, ITIL, PMI, or Six Sigma) *Managing relations with both   business and technical delivery and sales teams *Demonstrated experience in analyzing complex solutions across multiple services. KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES *Knowledge of past, current and emerging IT services solutions and technologies *Ability to drive client solutions and thought leadership around strategic Insight service solutions (e.g., executive presentation, technical presentations, whiteboard sessions) *Knowledge of vertical industry requirements e.g., (Financial Services including Banking, Insurance, Health Care, Public Sector, Life Sciences including Pharmaceutical, Manufacturing). *Experience with driving or supporting multiple services and solutions *Consistently demonstrate attention to detail *Strong customer service skills *Strong research and analytical ability *Excellent written and verbal communications skills *Ability to prioritize and work independently *Ability to build cost models and proposal documentation models for clients, including ROI/TCO *Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively as part of a team sales effort, and to successfully operate in a flexible, virtual operating environment About InsightInsight's success begins with our people making meaningful connections every day. Our culture lives in our teammates. Insight is looking for great people who will embrace our values of Hunger, Heart and Harmony. Hunger to create new opportunities for our clients. Heart to make a positive impact in people's lives. Harmony to celebrate each other's unique contributions to bring solutions to clients.Join us as we work to deliver the best solutions through Intelligent Technology(tm), the new IT.*Global technology provider of IT hardware, software and service solutions *Fortune 500 company founded in 1988 *5,400 teammates worldwide, operating in 22 countries *One of The Valley's 2015 Healthiest Employers (Phoenix Business Journal) *2015 Dell Healthcare Partner of the Year, 2015 HP PartnerOne Financial Services Partner of the Year, 2014 Cisco Global Architectural Excellence Partner of the Year, Microsoft's No. 1 Global Licensing Solution ProviderDiscover more at insight.com or email jobs@insight.com.Insight is an equal opportunity employer, and all   national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, sexual orientation   law.Posting Notes: Tempe || Arizona (US-AZ) || United States (US) || None || IND1; MONUS || Tempe, AZ || Company info Insight 
Company Profile Now more than ever it's important to have an IT solutions partner who can help you accomplish more of your IT goals, achieve new efficiencies and realize cost savings every step of the way. Whether you need fast access to essential technologies or the support of technical experts for the strategic planning and deployment of solutions, Insight can help. Employer job
